qas.question: What happened days following the disaster?

answers.text: an international reconnaissance team of engineers was dispatched to the region

qas.question: What did the team of engineers do?

answers.text: make a detailed preliminary survey of damaged buildings
a variety of reasons why many constructions failed to withstand the earthquake.

qas.question: After the quake what kind of international team was sent to the area?
What was the team sent to China to make?
What kind of reasons do their findings show?

Phát hiện của họ cho thấy <a2_0> một <a5_0> nhiều lý do <a5_0/> tại sao nhiều công trình không chịu được trận động đất.
